1.title: The Rival

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Back in time to when Anais is a newborn baby and Gumball and Darwin are jealous of her sparking a baby war.

2.title: The Lady

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: The kids find out Dad has been dressing as a woman to make friends.

3.title: The Sucker

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Darwin ends up in detention with Julius Oppenheimer Jr. for trying to fix Julius' vandalism, and he cons Darwin into joining his gang, but soon regrets it when everything Darwin does goes wrong.

4.title: The Vegging

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Gumball and Darwin just want to veg out all day but end up having to save the rest of the family.

5.title: The One

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Tobias tries to be Gumball's best friend.

6.title: The Father

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: The kids convince Richard to try and reconnect with his father, Frankie, through bonding, but Richard starts to lose his patience when Frankie cannot break his criminal habits.

7.title: The Cringe

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: Gumball and Hot Dog Guy go back in time to when they first met to figure out why they are so awkward with each other.

8.title: The Cage

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Mr. Corneille becomes a cage fighter and goes against a fearsome Russian wrestler.

9.title: The Neighbor

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Gumball and Darwin try to find out their neighbor's name.

10.title: The Anybody

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Clayton is advised to shape-shift into other people to escape boredom.

11.title: The Faith

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Alan loses faith in humanity, causing the world to turn black and white.

12.title: The Candidate

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: When the Elmore Junior High students get locked in school after their parents have a charity gala, Gumball is appointed as leader to get them out, causing chaos to ensue.

13.title: The Pact

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: Gumball and Professor Brown make a pact to tell each other's girlfriends about problems they have.

14.title: The Shippening

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: Bizarre events unravel in Elmore when Sarah writes romantic fan fiction in a mysterious notebook.

15.title: The Stink

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: Mr. Small goes feral after Gumball and Darwin expose his hypocrisy.

16.title: The Brain

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

16.plot: Anais has been facepalming every time her family does something stupid, which has led to a serious medical condition. In fact, if she facepalms just one more time she could do her brain irreparable damage, so the Wattersons have to get through the week without doing anything idiotic.

17.title: The Parents

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

17.plot: After accidentally bumping into each other in the grocery aisle, Nicole and her parents have it out. The Wattersons discover why Nicole and her parents haven't been on speaking terms for so long. The kids decide to bring about a reunion, in order to secure that backlog of birthday and holiday presents...

18.title: The Founder

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

18.plot: When Nicole decides to pay the cable bill in person at Chanax, she leaves specific instructions for Richard to stay in the car. However he's far too tempted by the vending machine in the foyer to follow her advice. Chanax believes Richard is their mysterious founder and follow his every whim, leading to their inevitable demise.

19.title: The Schooling

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

19.plot: Gumball and Darwin are at the convenience store considering playing truant. Larry warns them that if they don't take their education seriously they'll end up like him. To prove his point, Larry lets Gumball and Darwin work some of his many roles to make them appreciate the value of a good education.

20.title: The Intelligence

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

20.plot: Gumball and Darwin argue with the Internet and make him mad. So mad in fact that he seeks to wipe out humanity and, while doing so, malfunctions! The whole of Elmore is plunged into a time before technology. It's actually pretty nice. Will Gumball and Darwin decide to leave the internet unplugged?

21.title: The Potion

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

21.plot: Gumball and Darwin learn that Hector is not so happy being giant-sized. So they decide to help him by creating a potion that will shrink him down to the size of an average person. However creating a magic potion is not as easy as it sounds, and the results can go spectacularly wrong...

22.title: The Spinoffs

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

22.plot: Wishing to get rid of Gumball once and for all, his nemesis Rob offers up a variety of reality, action and comedy shows featuring characters other than Gumball. Unfortunately for Rob each one is worse than the last...

23.title: The Transformation

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

23.plot: Penny's family is unhappy that she's decided to come out of her shell... literally. And Penny wants her family to come out of their shells...also literally. They are at an impasse so who do they turn to in their time of trouble? Gumball of course! Needless to say he is way outside of his comfort zone...

24.title: The Understanding

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

24.plot: Gumball and Darwin find themselves in serious trouble when they agree to everything the new kid in school says. The truth is they can't understand a word that he says. Peter Pepperoni has been home schooled and developed a very odd way of speaking. Due to a series of misunderstandings Gumball and Darwin end up on the run from the law.

25.title: The Ad

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

25.plot: To make ends meet, the Wattersons are forced to rent out their house. However, with nowhere else to stay they decide to secretly remain at the house. When they accidentally surprise their guests, an elderly pair of fainting goats, they faint...unsurprisingly. The Wattersons fear the worst and attempt to cover up this "accident".

26.title: The Ghouls

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

26.plot: The boys join Carrie on an adventure to get all the ghouls of Elmore their scare back.

27.title: The Awareness

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

27.plot: Gumball decides to engross himself in plant culture to appease Leslie after making an offensive comment.

28.title: The Slip

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

28.plot: Richard misses a package and is forced into an escalating feud with the delivery guy.

29.title: The Drama

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

29.plot: Gumball tries to protect Darwin from his unsuitable undead girlfriend Carrie.

30.title: The Buddy

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

30.plot: Anais and Jamie form an unlikely partnership when they're accused of a crime they didn't commit.

31.title: The Silence

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

31.plot: Gumball and Darwin finally run out of things to say to each other.

1.title: The DVD

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Gumball and Darwin try to get out of returning a rented DVD when they accidentally destroy it.

2.title: The Responsible

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Gumball and Darwin babysit Anais while their parents go to a school meeting.

3.title: The Third

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Gumball and Darwin hope that adding a third friend to their activities will break up the monotony.

4.title: The Debt

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: When Mr. Robinson stops backing up his car and avoids hitting Gumball on the curb, Gumball feels like he owes a debt to him and vows to protect him.

5.title: The End

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Darwin and Gumball think it's the end of the world.

6.title: The Dress

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: When Gumball has nothing but his Mom's wedding dress to wear for school he realizes that everyone thinks he is a beautiful girl and treat him like royalty, especially Darwin who, unknowing of the truth, acquires a crazy obsession for him.

7.title: The Quest

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: Gumball and Darwin help Anais rescue her doll from Tina Rex.

8.title: The Spoon

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: When Dad forgets a birthday present for Mom, he sends Gumball and Darwin to the gas station to get one. While there, they aid a robber, but don't realize it.

9.title: The Pressure

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Gumball tries to save Darwin from being kissed by a girl.

10.title: The Painting

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Principal Brown is concerned about a picture that Anais drew of her family. He decides the family is dysfunctional. Now Nicole has to stay home, Richard must get a job, and the boys work with Mr. Small to vent their energy.

11.title: The Laziest

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Gumball and Darwin challenge Dad to a "lazy-off."

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

13.title: The Mystery

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: Miss Simian's class finds Principal Brown wrapped up in toilet paper, shaved and covered in green paint. Gumball decides to find out who the culprit is before his entire class (and the janitor) faces detention.

14.title: The Prank

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: Gumball and Darwin repeatedly play pranks on their dad, all to the point where he goes crazy.

15.title: The Gi

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: Gumball and Darwin's martial arts costumes make them a laughing stock at school.

16.title: The Kiss

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

16.plot: When Gumball gets kissed by Granny Jojo, Darwin tries to help him forget.

17.title: The Party

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

17.plot: Tobias' sister, Rachel, is having a high-school party and Gumball's class is invited, providing they can bring along a date.

18.title: The Refund

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

18.plot: Gumball and Darwin feign Larry for a video game refund.

19.title: The Robot

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

19.plot: Gumball discovers that Bobert is planning to take over his identity and replace him.

20.title: The Picnic

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

20.plot: Gumball's class goes on a picnic and they get lost in the evil forest when they get separated from the class and have to survive.

21.title: The Goons

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

21.plot: Anais wants to join the boys and Richard in their silly antics, so Gumball and Darwin teach her how to fit in so she can have fun. However, the result leaves Gumball feeling left out.

22.title: The Secret

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

22.plot: Gumball forces Darwin to tell him a secret.

23.title: The Sock

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

23.plot: Gumball and Darwin are taught confusing lessons about honesty by the school counselor.

24.title: The Genius

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

24.plot: Darwin is taken away because the government thinks that he's a genius.

25.title: The Poltergeist

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

25.plot: Gumball and Darwin give Mr. Robinson a home and end up saving his marriage.

26.title: The Mustache

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

26.plot: Gumball and Darwin make a wish to be men, but learn that it's not as great as you might think.

27.title: The Date

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

27.plot: Gumball discovers the difference between a "date" and a "pet's funeral" - the hard way.

28.title: The Club

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

28.plot: Gumball wants to join a club, but no one wants him except for the nerds.

29.title: The Wand

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

29.plot: Gumball and Darwin make their dad believe in magic again.

30.title: The Ape

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

30.plot: Miss Simian wants to be friends with Gumball and Darwin.

31.title: The Car

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

31.plot: Gumball and Darwin accidentally destroy Mr Robinson's new car - or do they?

32.title: The Curse

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

32.plot: Gumball thinks there is a curse on him because he is having so much bad luck.

33.title: The Microwave

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

33.plot: Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family.

34.title: The Meddler

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

34.plot: After seeing that he needs more attention, Mom meddles with Gumball's life.

35.title: The Helmet

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

35.plot: Gumball's magic tinfoil helmet threatens to tear the Watterson family apart.

36.title: The Fight

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

36.plot: Gumball snaps at Tina, the Tyrannosaurus Rex bully, and reluctantly agrees to fight with her.

1.title: The Remote

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: The Wattersons' battle for possession of the TV remote gets dirty.

2.title: The Colossus

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: After declining a friend request, Gumball and Darwin try to improve Hector's life, the giant of Elmore.

3.title: The Knights

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Gumball and Tobias compete for Penny's affection by putting on the lamest duel in history.

4.title: The Fridge

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: When Mom discovers Gumball has no ambition she is determined to turn him into a winner.

5.title: The Flower

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Gumball gets jealous after Penny is seen hanging out with Leslie.

6.title: The Banana

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Darwin lends his pen to Banana Joe, but when it comes back chewed, Gumball's thoughts turn to revenge.

7.title: The Phone

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: When Gumball and Darwin get their first cell phone, they foolishly give out their number to super-intense Ocho.

8.title: The Job

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Dad gets his first job as a pizza delivery guy, but strange things begin to happen around Elmore as a result and the Wattersons must stop it.

9.title: Halloween

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Carrie takes Gumball, Darwin and Anais to a real haunted house party on Halloween.

10.title: The Treasure

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Gumball looks into why the family doesn't have any money for nice things and ends up on a treasure hunt.

11.title: The Apology

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Ms. Simian tries to frame Gumball and Darwin after a misunderstanding involving her revealing dress.

12.title: The Words

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: Darwin is too polite to speak his mind, so Gumball teaches him to be direct via an epic battle of insults.

13.title: The Skull

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: Gumball and Darwin make friends with classmate Clayton, a compulsive liar who can shape-change.

14.title: The Bet

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: Gumball tries to treat Bobert as a regular kid by doing a bet with him. After Gumball wins, he chooses the stipulation: Bobert is his slave for 24 hours.

15.title: Christmas

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: Santa Claus is coming to town. Unfortunately he gets run over by the Wattersons, so it's up to them to save Christmas.

16.title: The Watch

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

16.plot: Gumball and Darwin learn that getting a family heirloom back off an old man is harder than you might think.

17.title: The Bumpkin

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

17.plot: Envious of his rustic lifestyle, Gumball invites Idaho over to teach the Wattersons how to live like a potato.

18.title: The Flakers

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

18.plot: When Gumball is left by Darwin to get beaten up by Tina, Gumball decides to return the favor.

19.title: The Authority

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

19.plot: Granny Jojo's overprotective behavior puts the Wattersons in danger - from themselves.

20.title: The Virus

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

20.plot: Teri teaches Gumball and Darwin that germs really can affect you.

21.title: The Pony

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

21.plot: Gumball and Darwin race home to spend quality time with Anais, but every likely obstacle gets in the way.

22.title: The Hero

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

22.plot: Gumball thinks his dad is embarrassing, but Richard thinks more of his son than he knows.

23.title: The Dream

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

23.plot: When Gumball blames Darwin for kissing Penny in his dream, it threatens to tear apart their friendship.

24.title: The Sidekick

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

24.plot: Darwin is tired of being Gumball's sidekick and wants to become the leader and make the decisions.

25.title: The Photo

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

25.plot: It's school picture day, and Gumball has until 3 p.m. to take one good photo.

26.title: The Tag

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

26.plot: Gumball and Darwin get caught in the middle of Dad and Mr. Robinson's trash can feud.

27.title: The Storm

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

27.plot: Love is in the air, and Gumball is caught in the center of an emotional hurricane - literally!

28.title: The Lesson

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

28.plot: When Gumball and Darwin get detention, they learn that detention feels more like prison.

29.title: The Game

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

29.plot: The Wattersons embark on their first family game of Dodge or Dare.

30.title: The Limit

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

30.plot: While out on a family shopping trip to the grocery store, the kids and dad push mom to the limit.

31.title: The Voice

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

31.plot: After getting an anonymous message, Gumball and Darwin must find out who it is before it's too late.

32.title: The Promise

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

32.plot: Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball, but there is a Banana Joe-shaped problem...

33.title: The Castle

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

33.plot: When Mom is away "anything goes," and Dad's lack of rules soon attracts unwelcome house guests.

34.title: The Boombox

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

34.plot: Gumball and Darwin try to understand Juke's urgent Beatbox message.

35.title: The Tape

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

35.plot: Gumball and Darwin fail to make some instant home-made movie classics.

36.title: The Sweaters

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

36.plot: A new girl, Sarah, causes trouble for Gumball and Darwin when she tries to get the guys from her old school to fight them. Gumball and Darwin aren't having it.

37.title: The Internet

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

37.plot: Gumball accidentally uploads an embarrassing video of himself and demands the internet to take it down.

38.title: The Plan

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

38.plot: When Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover a mysterious letter about their mom, they come up with a plan to save her.

39.title: The World

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

39.plot: The amazing world of Elmore is full of inanimate objects that aren't nearly as inanimate as you might hope.

40.title: The Finale

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

40.plot: The Wattersons are surprised to find out that their actions have consequences. Now they have to solve the problems left hanging.

1.title: The Kids

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Gumball and Darwin's voices may be breaking, but they're showing no signs of growing up. Whilst Gumball and Darwin make fun of Mom and Dad for being old, their voices start to break. They try to ignore it, but everybody they meet reacts to their new and unpredictable voices.

2.title: The Fan

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Sarah, the new student at Elmore Jr. High, becomes Gumball and Darwin's number one, slightly obessive, fan.

3.title: The Coach

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. The new Coach witnesses Jamie bullying the other kids at lunch and steps in. Jamie is made to apologize, much to the amazement of the other kids. Gumball and Darwin worry about Jamie seeking revenge, especially when they see him sneaking into the back of Coach's car.

4.title: The Joy

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: When Mrs. Simian sees Gumball and Darwin joyful on Monday, she knows that something is wrong with them. She performs tests on them, but the nurse disapproves what she's doing. But suddenly, Gumball and Darwin start to infect the school with the 'Joy Virus', and it's up to Mrs Simian and her tape player to cure the students.

5.title: The Puppy

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: The kids finally get the puppy they always wanted, except it's actually a turtle, and it hates them.

6.title: The Recipe

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Gumball and Darwin attempt to discover the secret behind their classmate Anton's Immortality.

7.title: The Name

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: When Mom reveals that Gumball's real name is "Zach," Gumball adopts a cheesy, annoying persona to match the name. His family tries to make him remember the old Gumball, as this new Zach persona is progressively taking over Gumball's life and erasing his memories.

8.title: The Extras

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: The background characters show us what they do every day.

9.title: The Gripes

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Gumball is in such a bad mood that it spreads to Darwin, who joins him in complaining about everything.

10.title: The Vacation

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: The Wattersons' vacation turns into a nightmare!

11.title: The Fraud

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Gumball and Darwin discover Principal Brown's diploma is fake, and Principal Brown is determined to keep their discovery a secret.

12.title: The Void

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: Gumball and Darwin investigate a missing schoolmate.

13.title: The Boss

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: Gumball and Darwin help Rocky land an office job so that his dad, Mr. Robinson, will be proud of him.

14.title: The Move

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: Clayton, a compulsive liar tells Gumball and Darwin about his awesome martial arts move, and discover that he wasn't lying.

15.title: The Law

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: Donut Cop shows Gumball and Darwin that the smallest misdemeanour can lead to a breakdown in law.

16.title: The Allergy

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

16.plot: Gumball and Anais have to find as cure for Darwin's allergy.

17.title: The Mothers

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

17.plot: It's Mother's Day, and kids put their moms through a series of tests to determine who has the World's Greatest Mom.

18.title: The Password

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

18.plot: When Gumball and Darwin discover that Anais is Richard's favorite child, they go to extreme lengths to take the title from her.

19.title: The Procrastinators

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

19.plot: When Gumball and Darwin are asked to take out the trash by 5:00 P.M. they try to find ways to procrastinate, but remember, don't forget about the trash.

20.title: The Shell

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

20.plot: Gumball cracks open Penny's shell and discovers who she really is inside.

21.title: The Burden

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

21.plot: When Gumball and Darwin are asked to look after the school hamster, they leave it at school for the weekend.

22.title: The Bros

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

22.plot: Darwin gets jealous of Gumball and Penny's relationship, and tries to break them up.

23.title: The Mirror

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

23.plot: Gumball ignores Darwin's advice and decides to not forward a scare email, cursing his family.

24.title: The Man

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

24.plot: Granny Jojo invites her new boyfriend for her birthday celebration, and Dad wants to ban her from seeing her again.

25.title: The Pizza

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

25.plot: Frustrated, Larry quits all of his jobs, unraveling the commercial structure of Elmore.

26.title: The Lie

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

26.plot: After seeing that everybody is down because it's January, Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday to spark excitement.

27.title: The Butterfly

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

27.plot: When a Butterfly emerges from its chrysalis Gumball and Darwin want to release it. Miss Simian warns them about the butterfly effect. Gumball releases it anyways, and a domino effect causes chaos throughout the city.

28.title: The Question

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

28.plot: After a sugar high, Gumball and Darwin ask the people of Elmore what they think is the meaning of life.

29.title: The Saint

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

29.plot: Gumball tries to make Alan lose his temper. But when he fails, he tries to turn the whole school against him.

30.title: The Friend

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

30.plot: Gumball and Darwin help Anais make up an imaginary friend who turns out to be all too real.

31.title: The Oracle

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

31.plot: Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joe's mom paints pictures which predict the future.

32.title: The Safety

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

32.plot: After being shown a video on safety in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with keeping his family safe.

33.title: The Society

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

33.plot: Gumball is convinced there is a Secret Society in school, and he wants in.

34.title: The Spoiler

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

34.plot: When Gumball and Darwin have to wait to see a movie, they must go a whole week without someone spoiling the plot.

35.title: The Countdown

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

35.plot: Miss Simian threatens to expel the boys if they are late for school, so they race a clock in order to arrive on time.

36.title: The Nobody

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

36.plot: Gumball and Darwin discover they have an uninvited house guest.

37.title: The Downer

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

37.plot: When Gumball's family tries to cheer him out of a inexplicable lousy mood, he wishes they would all disappear.

38.title: The Egg

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

38.plot: Nicole wants to show to Felicity that the Wattersons are a normal family, while her son, Billy, meets Anais.

39.title: The Triangle

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

39.plot: Darwin has been chosen to play a solo in the marching band, but someone may be trying to sabotage him.

40.title: The Money

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

40.plot: Richard ruins the family, so they need to be in an ad but Gumball doesn't want to sell the Wattersons.

1.title: The Return

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Richard tries to find Gumball, Darwin and Anais in their first day at school before Nicole notices they're gone.

2.title: The Nemesis

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Gumball and Darwin discover that Rob, who once swore to wreak vengeance on them, has been trying to destroy them for some time - but his traps never work.

3.title: The Crew

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: When Gumball and Darwin decide it's time they join a crew, they agree that the coolest posse in Elmore is the Senior Citizens.

4.title: The Others

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: When Anais reveals that she's in the grade above them at school, Gumball and Darwin's eyes are suddenly opened to a whole new world of other students at Elmore Junior High. Gumball is horrified to learn that there are a bunch of characters who are barely aware of his existence and is determined to force his way into their lives.

5.title: The Signature

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Dad discovers that Granny Jojo and Louie are planning to get married and move to Florida. To stop this happening he adopts Louie so that (as his father) he can forbid him from marrying Granny Jojo. But this triggers a series of adoptions within the family which quickly spirals out of control, and causes the unexpected return of someone from Dad's past...

6.title: The Check

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Gumball, Darwin and Anais are delighted when Grandpa Louie gives them a check for $5000. They immediately start fantasizing over what to spend it on. But when Mom and Dad say they're going to spend the money on paying bills instead, it's a race to the bank to see who can cash the check first.

7.title: The Pest

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: When they find Anais training for a brutal showdown, Gumball and Darwin realize that their sister is being pestered at school by an annoying kid: Billy. They try to teach her how to resolve the problem peacefully, but Billy has other ideas.

8.title: The Sale

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Gumball and Darwin are devastated to learn that Mr. Robinson is selling his house and leaving town. When they realize that making some final memories with Mr. Robinson is not enough, they decide to sabotage the sale.

9.title: The Gift

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: After they receive an extravagant invitation to Masami's birthday party, Gumball and Darwin are anxious to find just the right gift for her.

10.title: The Parking

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: The Wattersons' search for a parking space at the mall takes a little longer than expected. When the Wattersons arrive at the mall for a day of shopping, they struggle to find a space in the parking lot. They search for a space everywhere -- using all their intelligence, cunning and trickery -- but as the day goes on, the desperate hunt for a space becomes more important than the trip to the mall itself.

11.title: The Routine

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Mom and the kids depart for their hard day's work, leaving a seemingly lazy Dad half-asleep on the sofa. Mom has given him one very simple job: buy mayonnaise. However, Dad manages to turn this mundane task into an epic quest, showing that his daily routine isn't as inactive as his family imagine.

12.title: The Upgrade

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: Gumball and Darwin see an advert for the latest, cutting-edge Bobert operating system and excitedly talk Bobert into downloading it. At first it seems like a massive improvement, but the many flaws in the new operating system become increasingly apparent.

13.title: The Comic

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: Gumball is the star of his own comic, but struggles to match up to his heroic alter-ego.

14.title: The Romantic

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: After Gumball convinces himself that Penny doesn't love him as much as she used to, he decides to put together a romantic quest to remind her of all the good times they've had together. But Gumball's romantic gesture backfires, landing Penny -- and maybe their relationship -- in serious peril.

15.title: The Uploads

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: Gumball goes onto Elmore Stream-It, but is immediately interrupted by Darwin's protest. Gumball begs Darwin to just let him see one video, but Darwin continues. He gets Gumball to back away from the computer and turn around, revealing that he has the mouse in his hand.

16.title: The Apprentice

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

16.plot: Gumball sets out to prove to Penny's father that he's good enough for his daughter. Gumball decides that the best way to prove to Mr. Fitzgerald that he's good enough for Penny is to become his apprentice for the day. The problem is, Mr. Fitzgerald has an important interview and Gumball's enthusiastic attempts to help him might actually do more harm than good, both to Mr. Fitzgerald's business and to Gumball's future with Penny.

17.title: The Hug

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

17.plot: Gumball tries to prove he's not predictable.

18.title: The Wicked

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

18.plot: Gumball and Darwin try to find just one good quality about their neighbor, Mrs. Robinson.

19.title: The Traitor

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

19.plot: Gumball calls Alan a traitor when Gumball thinks Alan lied to get out of having dinner together.

20.title: The Origins Part 1

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

20.plot: When Mom and Dad struggle to keep hyperactive, toddler-aged Gumball from trashing the house and exhausting them, they decide to buy him a pet.

21.title: The Origins Part 2

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

21.plot: Darwin tries to return to his family after accidentally getting flushed down the toilet.

22.title: The Girlfriend

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

22.plot: Jamie decides she needs a sweetheart and, unlucky for him, Darwin is chosen.

23.title: The Advice

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

23.plot: Gumball and Darwin try to comfort the disillusioned Mr. Small by taking his advice and proving that he is a good teacher.

24.title: The Signal

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

24.plot: Gumball develops a strange stutter, and it makes him accidentally offend Darwin.

25.title: The Parasite

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

25.plot: Anais makes a new friend at school whom Gumball and Darwin believe to be a social parasite.

26.title: The Love

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

26.plot: The people of Elmore explain to Bobert the meaning of love.

27.title: The Awkwardness

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

27.plot: While going to the store to get ketchup, Gumball runs into Hot Dog Guy again.

28.title: The Nest

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

28.plot: After people in Elmore start to go missing, it's up to Gumball and Darwin to figure out why this is happening.

29.title: The Points

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

29.plot: Gumball and Darwin have to do Tobias' chores for using his points in a video game.

30.title: The Bus

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

30.plot: Four parents try to teach the students of Elmore High a lesson about skipping school.

31.title: The Night

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

31.plot: The Moon examines dreams of Elmore residents.

32.title: The Misunderstandings

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

32.plot: Gumball has a misunderstanding with Penny about a date.

33.title: The Roots

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

33.plot: The family try to make Darwin connect with his fish roots.

34.title: The Blame

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

34.plot: Billy passes out after playing video games and his mother tries to ban them.

35.title: The Slap

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

35.plot: Gumball wants to be greeted by Tobias with his special high five slap.

36.title: The Detective

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

36.plot: Anais believes Gumball and Darwin stole Daisy, so they'll need to found it.

37.title: The Fury

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

37.plot: A strange figure arrives and insults Nicole, but the kids are surprised when Nicole doesn't fight back.

38.title: The Compilation

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

38.plot: A compilation of the funniest and craziest videos the inhabitants of Elmore have uploaded to the Internet.

39.title: The Scam

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

39.plot: Gumball wants to show that the school is haunted.

40.title: The Disaster

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

40.plot: Rob finds a remote that controls the universe and travels back in time to enact revenge on Gumball.

1.title: The Rerun

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: In a sequel of "The Disaster", the remote has now taken Gumball back to the beginning of that disastrous day.

2.title: The Stories

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Molly gets coaching from the guys to improve her story telling.

3.title: The Guy

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Gumball and Darwin put Anais' new friend, Josh, through a series of tests, to see if he's good enough for their sister.

4.title: The Boredom

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Gumball and Darwin search for adventure during their walk around Elmore.

5.title: The Vision

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: After finding a secret manifesto on Alan's memory stick, Gumball and Darwin decide to foil his plan for world domination.

6.title: The Choices

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: While reminiscing about meeting Richard, Nicole wonders if her life would have been better if she'd taken a different path.

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

8.title: The Test

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: When he is labeled a "loser'' in an online test, Gumball believes he must do the opposite of everything he would normally do.

9.title: The Slide

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Rocky is trying to find love with the help of the latest dating app.

10.title: The Loophole

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Gumball and Darwin attempt to teach Bobert to behave safely, but Bobert applies logic to their rules.

11.title: The Copycats

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Gumball and Darwin are confused when they meet Chi Chi and Ribbit, a pair of siblings that copy everything they do and say. Then they find out this copycat family is making money online from imitating the Watterson family.

12.title: The Potato

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: When Darwin has lunch with Idaho, he decides to stop eating potatoes in solidarity with his brotato, but he finds his obsession with his favorite food harder to kick than he ever imagined, so Gumball decides to help his friend curb his carb cravings.

13.title: The Fuss

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: Nicole tries, and fails, to hide her disappointment when Richard and the kids fail to remember her special day. Richard has to figure out what special day he has actually forgotten and then make it a day to remember or else.

14.title: The Outside

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: When the family goes to visit Richard's dad, Frankie, who lives in a trailer in the town dump, they assume that he's done time in prison based on his extended absence from Richard's life and try to make him feel more at home.

15.title: The Vase

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: Sick of Granny Jojo's ugly gifts, Nicole encourages the kids to take matters into their own hands and accidentally break her latest hideous vase. But when Gumball, Darwin and Anais try to destroy it, they discover it is more robust than it seems.

16.title: The Matchmaker

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

16.plot: After seeing a photo that Darwin has of someone, Gumball believes it to be his crush, and does everything he can to set them up, but makes a huge mistake

17.title: The Box

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

17.plot: The Wattersons receive an unmarked package in the mail. To distract themselves from the urge to open it they all take turns to imagine what it might contain.

18.title: The Console

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

18.plot: When everyone gives Gumball a cursed video game console, Elmore becomes trapped inside a fantasy RPG world. Gumball, Darwin and Anais have to battle their way through town, unraveling the secrets of their new virtual reality.

19.title: The Ollie

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

19.plot: When Darwin asks Gumball to teach him how to skate, Gumball makes sure he covers every aspect of the skating lifestyle from wearing the right gear, using the right terms and choosing the right board.

20.title: The Catfish

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

20.plot: When Gumball and Darwin realize Grandpa Louie has no friends, they create one called Muriel, when Granny Jojo finds out Louie has been spending time online with another "woman", Muriel not existing isn't going to stop her from being destroyed.

21.title: The Cycle

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

21.plot: Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Mr. Wilson has been picking on their Dad for most of his life; ever since he humiliated Richard with a high school prank.

22.title: The Stars

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

22.plot: When Dad gives Larry's hairdresser a bad review for saying he's bald, he gets offered a free haircut. This inspires Gumball and Darwin to go on a reviewing spree across town, forcing Larry to give them stuff with the threat of a bad review.

23.title: The Grades

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

23.plot: Miss Simian discovers a failed test from Gumball's past that brings down his grade point average.

24.title: The Diet

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

24.plot: Gumball and Darwin manage to help Richard follow his diet.

25.title: The Ex

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

25.plot: When Rob gets a new nemesis, Gumball tries to make Rob hate him again.

26.title: The Sorcerer

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

26.plot: Gumball refuses to accept he is the only kid at school that doesn't have special powers. He convinces Mrs. Jötunheim, Hector's mom, to take him on as her apprentice but she soon learns leaving Gumball unsupervised around magic is a big mistake.

27.title: The Menu

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

27.plot: The boys help Richard find a secret item on the Joyful Burger menu.

28.title: The Uncle

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

28.plot: The boys want to meet their friend Ocho's famous uncle.

29.title: The Weirdo

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

29.plot: The boys help Sussie act less weird after bullies make fun of her.

30.title: The Heist

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

30.plot: Mr. Dad wears his motorbike helmet into a bank and faces the consequences.

31.title: The Singing

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

31.plot: Join the citizens of Elmore for a song and dance spectacular that will have people covering their ears with joy.

32.title: The Best

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

32.plot: Carmen continuously annoys Gumball by correcting or criticizing his standards.

33.title: The Worst

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

33.plot: The Wattersons come home angry, believing they have the worst day, so they decide to swap genders and age in order to find out who has it the worst.

34.title: The Petals

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

34.plot: Gumball and Darwin become fashion gurus.

35.title: The Nuisance

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

35.plot: The Wattersons fear the worst when they are summoned to a Town Hall meeting, but are surprised when they're offered a new house until they discover it's in a different state.

36.title: The News

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

36.plot: From police chases to the inside scoop on Daisy the Donkey, Channel 6 Elmore News has all the top local stories. Newscaster Kip Schlezinger brings the latest news, sports and weather, even when there is absolutely nothing to report.

37.title: The Deal

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

37.plot: When Nicole finally gets a raise and an employee of the month plaque, Richard feels that he doesn't get enough credit for his work around the house. As a result, he goes on strike, causing the kids to revert to terrifying monsters.

38.title: The Line

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

38.plot: The Wattersons will do whatever it takes to get into the first screening of the latest Stellar Odyssey sequel.

39.title: The List

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

39.plot: When the kids find out that Nicole's life hasn't panned out as she'd hoped, they start taking on her chores, but they accidentally grab her bucket list instead of her to-do list.

40.title: The Puppets

episode of.title: The Amazing World of Gumball (TV Series 2011– )

40.plot: Collaboration between the "Amazing World Of Gumball" crew and British production company, "Blink Industries", with Becky Sloan and Joseph Pelling.

locations: Abraham Lincoln High School - 2162 24th Avenue, San Francisco, California, USA::(backgrounds)
1026 York Street, Vallejo, California, USA::(Watterson's family house)
Lincoln Elementary School, Vallejo, California, USA::(Playground shots)
imdb.plot outline: Welcome to Elmore! This quaint little suburb isn't quite what it seems, as in Elmore, just about everything has the ability to come to life! The Amazing World of Gumball follows the misadventures of Gumball, a twelve-year-old cat. With the help of his best friend Darwin, his former pet goldfish that grew legs and joined the family, he gets into all sorts of antics. He is joined by his sister, Anais, a four-year-old bunny with heightened intelligence. His father, Richard, and his mother, Nicole, are there to provide him support as well.
imdb.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
plot: The life of a 12-year-old boy who happens to be a blue cat as he lives with his family and other strange creatures.::Hailey-7

Welcome to Elmore! This quaint little suburb isn't quite what it seems, as in Elmore, just about everything has the ability to come to life! _The Amazing World of Gumball_ (qv) follows the misadventures of Gumball, a twelve-year-old cat. With the help of his best friend Darwin, his former pet goldfish that grew legs and joined the family, he gets into all sorts of antics. He is joined by his sister, Anais, a four-year-old bunny with heightened intelligence. His father, Richard, and his mother, Nicole, are there to provide him support as well.::Juan Carlos Morales

What if your teacher was 300,000 years old? Or what if your best friend was a balloon? Or what if you were a blue cat? Enter the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12 year old blue cat, and his adopted goldfish brother, 10 year old Darwin, and their amazing town of Elmore, where the strangest things happen every day. Combining action, adventure, and comedy, TAWOG is basically the misadventures of two best friends.::Stevie Lee Silverman
